verses.text: \w It|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* commonly \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w If|strong="H2005"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w put|strong="H7971"\w* \w away|strong="H7971"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w marry|strong="H0802"\w* \w another|strong="H0312"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w* \w any|strong="H0376"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w*? \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w polluted|strong="H2610"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* defiled? \w but|strong="H3808"\w* thou hast \w prostituted|strong="H2181"\w* thyself \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w lovers|strong="H7453"\w*: nevertheless \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w receive|strong="H1961"\w* thee.

\w Lift|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* thy \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w high|strong="H5375"\w*: \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w where|strong="H0375"\w* thou hast \w not|strong="H3808"\w* prostituted thyself: Thou didst \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, waiting \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w as|strong="H3427"\w* \w a|strong="H7200"\w* robber \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*: \w and|strong="H0776"\w* thou hast \w polluted|strong="H2610"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* thy fornications, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w showers|strong="H7241"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* withholden, \w and|strong="H0802"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* lateward \w rain|strong="H4456"\w*: thou hadst \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w harlotâ€™s|strong="H2181"\w* \w forehead|strong="H4696"\w*, thou wouldst \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w blush|strong="H3637"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H6258"\w* \w at|strong="H3808"\w* least \w at|strong="H3808"\w* \w this|strong="H6258"\w* \w time|strong="H6258"\w* \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H0001"\w* \w me|strong="H7121"\w*: Thou art \w my|strong="H6258"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, \w the|strong="H7121"\w* guide \w of|strong="H0001"\w* \w my|strong="H6258"\w* virginity:

Wilt thou \w be|strong="H5331"\w* \w angry|strong="H5201"\w* \w for|strong="H0518"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*, \w or|strong="H0518"\w* wilt thou \w continue|strong="H5331"\w* until \w the|strong="H0518"\w* \w end|strong="H5331"\w*? \w Behold|strong="H2009"\w*, thou hast \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w*, \w and|strong="H5769"\w* hast \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* things, \w and|strong="H5769"\w* hast \w been|strong="H5769"\w* \w able|strong="H3201"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* Josias: Hast thou \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w what|strong="H0834"\w* rebellious \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* hast \w done|strong="H6213"\w*? \w she|strong="H1931"\w* hath \w gone|strong="H1980"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w herself|strong="H1931"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w high|strong="H1364"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w green|strong="H7488"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* hath \w played|strong="H2181"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w harlot|strong="H2181"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3063"\w* \w when|strong="H7200"\w* \w she|strong="H3808"\w* \w had|strong="H3063"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w things|strong="H0428"\w*, \w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w she|strong="H3808"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w*. \w And|strong="H3063"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w treacherous|strong="H0901"\w* \w sister|strong="H0269"\w* Juda \w saw|strong="H7200"\w*,

\w That|strong="H0834"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* rebellious \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* \w played|strong="H2181"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w harlot|strong="H2181"\w*, \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w away|strong="H7971"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* bill \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w divorce|strong="H7971"\w*: \w yet|strong="H3588"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w treacherous|strong="H0898"\w* \w sister|strong="H0269"\w* Juda \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w went|strong="H0413"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w played|strong="H2181"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w harlot|strong="H2181"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w herself|strong="H1931"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w by|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* facility \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w her|strong="H1961"\w* fornication she defiled \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w played|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* harlot \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w* \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* stocks.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w after|strong="H0413"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w*, \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w treacherous|strong="H0901"\w* \w sister|strong="H0269"\w* Juda hath \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w falsehood|strong="H8267"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*: \w The|strong="H0559"\w* rebellious \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* hath \w justified|strong="H6663"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*, \w in|strong="H0413"\w* comparison \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w treacherous|strong="H0898"\w* Juda.

\w Go|strong="H1980"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w proclaim|strong="H7121"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w toward|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w north|strong="H6828"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* thou shalt \w say|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Return|strong="H7725"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* rebellious \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* \w away|strong="H7725"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w holy|strong="H2623"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w angry|strong="H5201"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w yet|strong="H3588"\w* \w acknowledge|strong="H3045"\w* thy \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* thou hast \w transgressed|strong="H6586"\w* \w against|strong="H6586"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thou hast \w scattered|strong="H6340"\w* thy \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w strangers|strong="H2114"\w* \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w green|strong="H7488"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* hast \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3820"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* pastors according \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* own \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, \w and|strong="H3820"\w* \w they|strong="H3820"\w* \w shall|strong="H3820"\w* \w feed|strong="H7462"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w with|strong="H3820"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1844"\w* \w and|strong="H3820"\w* doctrine.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w multiplied|strong="H7235"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w increase|strong="H7235"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w those|strong="H1992"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w*: \w The|strong="H0559"\w* \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w visited|strong="H6485"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w any|strong="H5750"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w How|strong="H0349"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* thee \w among|strong="H5159"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee \w a|strong="H5414"\w* lovely \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w the|strong="H0559"\w* goodly \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w armies|strong="H6635"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Gentiles|strong="H1471"\w*? \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: Thou shalt \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* shalt cease \w to|strong="H0559"\w* walk \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w But|strong="H0403"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w that|strong="H3651"\w* despiseth \w her|strong="H0802"\w* \w lover|strong="H7453"\w*, \w so|strong="H3651"\w* hath \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* despised \w me|strong="H1004"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Return|strong="H7725"\w*, \w you|strong="H0859"\w* rebellious \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w heal|strong="H7495"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* rebellions. \w Behold|strong="H2005"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w come|strong="H0857"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* thee: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* thou art \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.
